Articles.Content:
I'm a bit new to ksp mods. Are there any mods that allow me to create a mun base/space station, piece by piece ( such as the way sky lab was made ), and then be able to independently dock different modules who's EVAs can enter in and out of said mun base/space station?

I know it may be a bit much. Help if you can please?

Docking is not implemented yet. And there are currently no mods that enable this.

Best way to make a space station\mun base right now is to grab a mod that adds station parts then cheat to get it where you want it.

Skylab wasn't made piece by piece. It was sent up in one piece.

Other than that, you'll have to wait for docking to be implemented, maybe in 0.18, maybe later...
I recommend BACE, Kosmos, and Zo2 to start. As a personal challenge, I NEVER use antigravity or warps to get my stations into orbit. I will mod a fuel tank to Timbuktu to get there though!
Ok thanks. And sorry I'm wrong, I was thinking of the international space station.
Check out the "Orbital & Planetary Construction" mod, it does part of what you want
+1 to Quantum, the Orbital and Planetary Construction mod allows you to make a Spacedock, then haul parts up to it. Then you can create craft that will spawn right at the spacedock.
